Levi BostianBuilding the next great app

Hello, there!

Hello there, I'm Levi.

I spend most of my time building and launching Android and iOS mobile apps.

I am currently building Your Circle, a virtual support group app for cancer patients. Caddy, a suite of tech products for non-technical business owners. I also freelance for startup companies.

Besides programming, I enjoy blogging, mentoring startup companies, longboarding, or spending time outdoors.
